NAME.Nominative: Thursday of the Second Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Thursday of the Second Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1<sup>st</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Raise up us the fallen, make us to return, for we have turned away from Thee, O God, Lover of mankind, Who upholdeth the ends of the earth.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: I sought the Lord, and He heard me
and delivered me from all my tribulations.
SEXTE.STICHOS: I will bless the Lord at all times.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: : Arise, O Lord, and be attentive unto my judgment.
let me not be put to shame in the age to come.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Judge them, O Lord, that do me injustice.
